description: Two hospital workers admit breaching rules by visiting a pub to watch football and are given fines.
title: Coronavirus: Key workers spared jail for Isle of Man Covid-19 law breach
title_page: Coronavirus: Key workers spared jail for Isle of Man Covid-19 law breach - BBC News
maintext: The court heard the men were given an exemption certificate to work at Nobles Hospital from 24 to 26 June and, after arriving by ferry on 24 June and visiting the hospital, they went to a hotel in Douglas at about 19:30 BST.
